## blockRendering.ConstantProvider.setDynamicProperties\_() method

Sets dynamic properties that depend on other values or theme properties.

**Signature:**

```typescript
protected setDynamicProperties_(theme: Theme): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  theme | [Theme](./blockly.theme.md) | The current workspace theme. |

**Returns:**

void
